Class Bongo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bongo

  • public class Bongo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the necessary logic for the BongoMain programm.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bongo()
      Implements a tribeless Bongo with zero beauty.
      Bongo(Tribe tribe)
      Implements a new Bongo with beauty 1.

    • Method Summary

      Get the beauty of a Bongo.

      Get the momentary chief of the Bongos.

        See Also:

      • brezelUp

        public Bongo brezelUp()
        Increments the beauty of the Bongo.

        If the beauty of the Bongo gets higher than the beauty of the chief, it becomes the new chief.

        Returns:
        reference to this

      • fetz

        public Bongo fetz(Bongo that)
        Simulates the fighting of two Bongos.

        After the fight both Gongos have their beauty reduced by half. If the beauty of one Bongo reachesd zero it gets banished.

        If one of the involved Bongos is the chief, it loses the position.

        Parameters:
        that - the opposing Bongo
        Returns:
        reference to this

      • getKin

        public int getKin()
        Gets the number of tribe kin.
        Returns:
        number of tribe kin as an int
